root.name: Grim Tales: The Legacy
root.description: OverviewGrim Tales: The Legacy is a hidden objects game developed by Elephant Games and published by Big Fish Games for the PC and Mac platforms.PlotGrim Tales: The Legacy starts out with the player being invited to the Christening of a new baby nephew. All is not well when arriving to the estate in which the Christening is happening however as the house seems to have been deserted.The player must then find clues to uncover what has happened and to the whereabouts of the sister.
